BriefDescription: A Page Table Entry was loaded into the TLB with Modified (M) data from another core's L3 on the same chip due to a instruction side request
Threshold counter exceed a count of 256
A Page Table Entry was loaded into the TLB from a location other than the local core's L3 due to a instruction side request
The NTC instruction is being held at dispatch because there are no slots in the DARQ for it
Finish stall because the NTF instruction was a load or store that was held in LSAQ because an older instruction from SRQ or LRQ won arbitration to the LSU pipe when this instruction tried to launch
Cycles in which the Store Queue is full on all 4 slices. This is event is not per thread. All the threads will see the same count for this core resource
TM abort
Final Pump Scope (system) mispredicted. Either the original scope was too small (Chip/Group) or the original scope was System and it should have been smaller. Counts for an instruction fetch
Marked Instruction RC dispatched in L2
The processor's data cache was reloaded with Modified (M) data from another core's ECO L3 on the same chip due to a demand load
The processor's data cache was reloaded from local core's L3 without conflict due to a demand load
Final Pump Scope (system) ended up larger than Initial Pump Scope (Chip/Group) for an instruction fetch
Marked store had to do a dclaim

Finish stall because the NTF instruction was a store waiting for a slot in the store finish pipe. This means the instruction is ready to finish but there are instructions ahead of it, using the finish pipe

Load Missed L1, counted at execution time (can be greater than loads finished). LMQ merges are not included in this count. i.e. if a load instruction misses on an address that is already allocated on the LMQ, this event will not increment for that load). Note that this count is per slice, so if a load spans multiple slices this event will increment multiple times for a single load.
Completion stall of one cycle because the LSU requested to flush the next iop in the sequence. It takes 1 cycle for the ISU to process this request before the LSU instruction is allowed to complete
Finish stall because the NTF instruction was a stcx waiting for response from L2
Completion stall by LSU instruction
The processor's data cache was reloaded from local core's L3 without dispatch conflicts hit on Mepf state due to a demand load
Completion stall because the ISU is updating the register and notifying the Effective Address Table (EAT)
1 or more ppc insts finished
LSU Reject due to LMQ full (up to 4 per cycles)
A Page Table Entry was loaded into the TLB with Shared (S) data from another core's L3 on the same chip due to a instruction side request
Sampled Read got a T intervention
threshold exceeded
PMC4 Rewind Event
Threshold counter exceeded a value of 1024
Finish stall because the NTF instruction was a mfspr instruction targeting an LSU SPR and it was waiting for the register data to be returned
Number of vector store instructions completed
The processor's data cache was reloaded from local core's L2 with dispatch conflict due to a marked load
Duration in cycles to reload with Shared (S) data from another chip's L2 or L3 on the same Node or Group (Remote), as this chip due to a marked load
Run instructions completed in transactional state (gated by the run latch)
Finish stall because the NTF instruction was a store with all its dependencies met, just waiting to go through the LSU pipe to finish
Duration in cycles to reload either shared or modified data from another core's L2/L3 on the same chip due to a marked load
Initial and Final Pump Scope was system pump (prediction=correct) for an instruction fetch
Sampled store did a rwitm and got a rty
Counter OFF
Overflow from counter 4

A Page Table Entry was loaded into the TLB from another chip's memory on the same Node or Group ( Remote) due to a data side request. When using Radix Page Translation, this count excludes PDE reloads. Only PTE reloads are included
cycles L2 RC took for a dclaim
Finish stall due to LRQ miscellaneous reasons, lost arbitration to LMQ slot, bank collisions, set prediction cleanup, set prediction multihit and others
cycles L2 RC took for a rwitm
A Page Table Entry was loaded into the TLB from local core's L3 due to a data side request. When using Radix Page Translation, this count excludes PDE reloads. Only PTE reloads are included
Number of times the TLB had the data required by the instruction. Applies to both HPT and RPT
Cycles in which the NTC instruction is waiting for a synchronous PMU interrupt
Internal Operations completed
Marked Branch mispredict that can cause a synchronous interrupt
Marked instruction was reloaded from a location beyond the local chiplet
A Page Table Entry was loaded into the TLB from local core's L3 without conflict due to a instruction side request
Marked Branch and link branch that can cause a synchronous interrupt
Finish stall because the NTF instruction was a tend instruction awaiting response from L2
Marked Load exposed Miss (use edge detect to count #)
A Page Table Entry was loaded into the TLB from local core's L3 without dispatch conflicts hit on Mepf state. due to a instruction side request
Pump prediction correct. Counts across all types of pumps for an instruction fetch
Sampled L2 reads retry count
A Page Table Entry was loaded into the TLB with Modified (M) data from another chip's L2 or L3 on a different Node or Group (Distant), as this chip due to a instruction side request
Pump misprediction. Counts across all types of pumps for an instruction fetch
Finish stall because the next to finish instruction was a store waiting on data
Erat Miss (TLB Access) All page sizes

This event increments every time the threshold event counter ticks. Thresholding must be enabled (via MMCRA) and the thresholding start event must occur for this counter to increment. It will stop incrementing when the thresholding stop event occurs or when thresholding is disabled, until the next time a configured thresholding start event occurs.
Sampled store did a rwitm and got a rty
New event for Branch Taken
A Page Table Entry was loaded into the TLB with Shared (S) data from another core's ECO L3 on the same chip due to a instruction side request

Finish stall because the NTF instruction was a store waiting for the next relaunch opportunity after an internal reject. This means the instruction is ready to relaunch and tried once but lost arbitration
Completion stall due to store forward
The processor's data cache was reloaded from another chip's L4 on the same Node or Group ( Remote) due to a marked load
The processor's data cache was reloaded with Shared (S) data from another core's ECO L3 on the same chip due to a marked load
Larx finished
Finish stall because the NTF instruction was an LSU op (other than a load or a store) with all its dependencies met and just going through the LSU pipe to finish
Marked RC done
A Page Table Entry was loaded into the TLB with Modified (M) data from another core's ECO L3 on the same chip due to a instruction side request
